Reviews.Title: excellent P&S; memory card is MICRO SD, not SD!
Reviews.Author: GMGB
Reviews.Content: NOTE: Do not buy this camera bundled with an SD card.  The card supported is micro SD.  We had no problems using an 8GB microSD card with this camera.Pro's:- excellent image quality- fast- decent flash- awesome video's- dual IS is great for low light without flash- 5x optical zoom- zooming all the way out gives a good wide angle shotCon's:- battery drain with dual IS because of post processing- takes a bit getting used to switching between modes

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Gran Papa "two guns and one bullet"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera but I sold it to someone never use it, but the person who bought it did not know the damage value it and very soon, but the product is very good.

ProductInfo.Features:
The TL110 packs a lot of performance into an ultra-slim design. Measuring just over 16.6mm
Now all you need is the camera to capture the world exactly the way you see it
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung TL110 Digital Camera 14.2 MP (Orange)
